to \"The Ohioan\" Hotel, Lewis Center in Ohio","sub-title":"","snippet-title":"Welcome to \"The Ohioan\"","snippet-description":"

We’re thrilled to share that Nationwide Hotel & Conference Center has been renovated and rebranded as The Ohioan!

The property offers newly renovated and flexible conference and event space along with an increase in capacity to accommodate large-scale and multi-component event needs. 

Former customers will find that the property has been significantly elevated while still maintaining its stately charm.

Modern updates have added conveniences to the property, while still honoring its historic roots.
